price: As for the moon, We have determined phases for it, until it becomes like an old palm stalk.
arabic: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
